text:
SKILLJAR: Seattle, WA | ONSITE | FULL TIME | Skilljar.com
ROLES: Senior Engineer, Front end Engineer, Designer and Product Manager at our Seattle startup. 
WHAT WE DO: Skilljar is the easiest way for businesses to educate their customers, vendors, and partners. We are a cloud-based learning management system (LMS) that enables businesses to scale their customer and partner training programs.
